sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description/> <name>Add classname in samp_sw_license_metric</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var script = "new global.SAMModelUtil().updateClassNameForTable('samp_sw_license_metric');"; GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script); }());]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-25 22:13:39</sys_created_on> <sys_id>da3a3f8a590f4510fa9bb8a304a5f7d8</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Add classname in samp_sw_license_metric</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">bd1f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43db</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_da3a3f8a590f4510fa9bb8a304a5f7d8</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 22:13:39</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
